dc.contributor.other.value: Agilent Technologies, Inc. is an American company that provides instruments, software, services, and consumables for the entire laboratory workflow. Its global headquarters is located in Santa Clara, California. Agilent was established in 1999 as a spin-off from Hewlett-Packard.

dc.description.abstract.value: Agilent SLIMS combines a laboratory information management system (LIMS) and an electronic laboratory notebook (ELN) to enable end-to-end solutions and manage all content and all context in the laboratory.  Agilent SLIMS integrates with simple and more complex instruments and supports workflows for Analytical, NGS, Biobanks and R&D labs. It is flexible and configurable, helping you increase your lab's productivity.

AK.K20.value: Could easily connect via APIs to a lot of these but doesn't currently have inbuilt functionality. Working on slack and teams integration.

AK.K31.value: Can retrieve from instruments, but not controlling instruments. All parsers are in Luma lab connect - parsers can be created to add to the openly available library.

AK.K41.value: The software offers a range of customisation features, however the users also have the option to work with the provider to get them to implement more custom features

AK.betriebssystem.value: Can be run on any OS via a web browser - need clarification on that question

AK.daten.eingabe.value: HELM editor - pistoia alliance standard, APIs as well, JDBC Connection (connects between databases)

AK.daten.export.value: PDF, some of it could be exported out in machine-readable format, need more details on the others (Will to advise)

AK.daten.speicherort.value: Can be any of these depending on the users preference, can be run locally or on their cloud or on the Dotmatics AWS server.

AK.daten.zugriff.value: Under modification for more responsive, some bits are currently.

AK.fach.value: Do Chemicals and Materials count under Engineering? What does genetics mean? (Genius is linked in)

AK.import.formate.value: .zip archives, txt, office files (xlxs, pptx, docx), pdf, images (not native tiff currently, but have jpg, png, bmp, gif), GENBank, PRISM, SnapGene, mol, rdx, SMILES, InChI, .csv, .tsv (will to update with more)

AK.kontroll.vokabular.value: Can adpat to companys specific requirements for controlled vocabularies

AK.labormanagement.funktionen.value: Can integrate with multiple commercially available LIMS and are working on own LIMS system. Has own inventory system.

AK.nutzungs.statistik.value: Collects what users have installed to ensure that everything is working properly

AK.nutzungsart.value: Either is available depending on customer preference.

AK.offline.function.value: Onsite capabilities - where there is no internet connection. There are some Desktop tools that don't require internet connection (e.g. Vortex).

AK.preismodell.value: Annual Billing - not a fixed cost, dependent on amount of users, customisation requirements etc

AK.support.value: Both types of user training are available - can also support both at the user and at the admin level

AK.templates.value: Can import export templates (depending on type) but not for the whole ELN, Microtitre plate templates via Excel

AT.aktiv.info.value: Latest version release was 6.2.1 on the 19th December 2023

AT.exit.strategy.value: Dotmatics would work with the customer on data export

K.daten.export.value: Complete content in document format

dc.contributor.other.value: Dotmatics are owned by the company previously known as Insightful Science (Who own SnapGene, Genius and Prism and Lab Archives) and the entire set of companies have been rebranded as Dotmatics

dc.description.abstract.value:
Dotmatics is a platform with many different capabilities that are listed below:
- Enable Collaborative Research: Capture and store experiments and share with internal and external collaborators in a single, intuitive framework to support data-driven decision making with secure, virtual notebook software.
- Capture Data Across Scientific Disciplines: Flexible templates in the digital lab notebook accommodate chemistry, biologics, chemicals and materials experiments and incorporate guidelines in maintaining a laboratory notebook effectively.
- Leverage Seamless Workflow Integration: Optimize the cycle of innovation with a cohesive notebook workflow, where data flows securely between the electronic lab book and experiment registration, screening, and decision support.

AK.K20.value: Marvin JS ChemAxon requires a valid license

additional integrations and extensions: ChemAssist (Chemistry features; Beta version, paid add-on at its full realease, available only for dedicated installations), CloneAssist (Molecular biology features; Beta version, paid add-on at its full release), Clustermarkets Equipment Scheduler, DMPTool (available only for dedicated installations), Elementa voice assistant (license and Android or iOS app required), Enhanced LaB Execution (Beta version, available only for Cloud), ImmunoMind, Microsoft Office Online Server (paid add-on, valid license required), mpVision, Pipsqueak Pro (valid license required), eLabSync (sync files from local device to eLabJournal account), eLabHybrid (linking files on local server to eLabJournal Cloud), eLabWebEdit (files in eLabJournal are automatically downloaded, opened in the appropriate programme and uploaded again after editing; the appropriate programme must be installed on the user's device; verified compatible applications: Libre Office, GraphPad, SnapGene, JupyterHub, ChemDraw, FlowJo, ImageJ, MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint)

AK.K31.value: via free add-ons: FLUICS PRINT, Eppendorf VisioNize sense, Eppendorf RackScan, Eppendorf SafeCode Consumable, Elemental Machines, ZPL Label Printer, Implen NanoPhotometer

AK.automatisierung.value: Data analysis: AI Processing via mpVision, image and video analysis via Pipsqueak Pro (add-ons required); from instrument: e. g. Eppendorf RackScan, Elemental Machines sensors (add-ons required, see "Device connection")

AK.betriebssystem.value: application server: Microsoft Windows Server 2019, including the capacity for file storage; database server: Ubuntu Server 18.04 LTS (recommended: 20.04 LTS)

AK.beweis.sicherheit.value: Functions for accreditation: The option to enable counter-signing is a group policy that can be activated by the group's administrator. In case of refusal, the witness can add a note about how to adjust the experiment before resubmitting it for signing.

AK.daten.eingabe.value: Calendar function: With the Clustermarket add-on (third-party account required) booking and equipment details can be added to experiments.; Following barcode scanners have been validated to work: Motorola KE-5500, CHS 7Qi, CHS 7Xi, CHH 7xiRx, Datalogic Magellan 800i; Chemical editor requires ChemAxon MarvinJS add-on; dictation function via add-on "Elementa" (Beta)

AK.daten.export.value: experiments, studies, projects: PDF with associated files, HTML, JSON, XML; inventory: PDF, CSV; batch export of all projects possible; For export of data in any custom format can be done using the API.

AK.daten.speicherort.value: location of provider's cloud: Europe or US depending on clients country; cloud of own choice: Amazon Web Service

AK.daten.zugriff.value: add-ons only available for Windows and Mac

AK.import.formate.value: directly displayed in the ELN: PDFs, raster graphics (e. g. JPEG, PNG, TIF, BMP, GIF) and MS Office formats (docx, xlsx, pptx; Office Online Server add-on required)

AK.import.methode.value: automatic import of data generated by devices (see "Automation")

AK.kollaboration.value: Users from the own lab can be added to experiments as collaborators.; Project groups can be set up for collaboration with other labs.

AK.nutzungs.statistik.value: The system administrator can check the latest login of each user and generate a license report, which provides and overview of the number of issued licenses by active users within the system.

AK.nutzungsart.value: Installation and updates are always done by the manufacturer, even for a local on-premises installation.

AK.preismodell.value: Academic: from 12.95 per user/month (cloud pricing; upgrade to private cloud or on-premises possible at any time); Industry: from 34.95 per user/month (cloud pricing; upgrade to private cloud or on-premises possible at any time)

AK.sprachen.value: Google Translate add-on must be activated for French, German and Spanish

AK.suchfunktion.value: Conditional search by filter functions; BLAST search requires CloneAssist add-on; search for reactions and chemical structure require ChemAssist and Marvin JS add-on

AK.support.value: Support via helpdesk, phone, or live chat on the website

AK.templates.value: Templates from internet sources, like protocols.io, can be imported the same way as own templates (by copy-paste actions); pre-configured protocols for molecular biology questions via add-on "Enhanced LaB Execution" (cloud only)

AK.workflows.value: external links via Hyperlinks and external file storage (requires External File Link add-on and client app which is available for Windows and Mac; add-on breaks GLP compliance regarding file integrity ans versioning); internal links to other protocols and samples

AT.anbieter.sicherungsstrategie.value: Cloud is hosted depending on the clients country from Europe (Netherlands and Irelands) or US (Ohio and North Virginia) data centers in High Availability installations. The hosting takes part in at least two geographically separated data centers. In this fully redundant infrastructure all data is replicated in real-time and archived on a third data base. Additionally, every 24 hours a full back-up of all data is stored in an encrypted vault in case of disaster recovery. eLabNext is ISO/IEC 27001:2013-certified and all servers are hosted from ISO 27001, SOCII, or ISEA 3201 compliant facilities. The system is protected by multiple firewalls, secure data transport using HTTPS encryption, regular security audits and preventive measures.

AT.nutzer.value: Faculty of Medicine and Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences of the University of Cologne, contact: Stefan Schwenke, stefan.schwenke@uni-koeln.de, description: eLabJournal was launched in 2019 as a joint project between the two faculties. For data protection reasons, a cloud solution was rejected and the system was installed on premise on the local servers in the university's computer centre. As of December 2022, 691 researchers use the system. The users are distributed among 28 working groups of the Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences in Biology and Biochemistry and 45 working groups of the Faculty of Medicine.

CECAD (cluster of excellence Cellular Stress Responses in Aging-Associated Diseases) at University of Cologne, Institute for Genetics, contact: Laurens Wachsmuth, l.wachsmuth@uni-koeln.de, description: eLabJournal is used as a replacement for the paper lab notebook. Most databases have been transferred to elabJournal and therefore it is used very much in the daily laboratory work.

Faculty of Medicine/University Medical Centre at RWTH Aachen, contact: Michael Kreisel (Research Data Management Advisor at the Faculty of Medicine), forschungsdekanat-elabjournal@ukaachen.de, description: As of December 2022, the instance includes about 200 users.

AT.nutzer2.value: Wageningen University, Utrecht University, University Medical Center Groningen, Harvard Medical School, Bayer, Forschungszentrum Jlich, Cologne University and University Hospital Cologne, RWTH Aachen University

dc.contributor.other.value: eLabNext was founded in 2010 and is a brand of Bio-ITech BV, part of Eppendorf group.

dc.description.abstract.value: eLabJournal is a comprehensive electronic laboratory journal suitable for all laboratory environments, from small academic institutions and start-up companies to large academic institutions and global corporations. Besides the full electronic lab notebook solution, eLabJournal also enables you to streamline the entire workflow in a laboratory, including sample tracking, protocol management, device sharing and booking as well as managing supplies. (source: provider website)

dc.contributor.other.value: The AgileBio project was founded in 2002 from the convergence of biological and informatics experiences of Pierre Rodrigues (Ph.D Virology Pasteur Institute and Paris 7 University)

dc.description.abstract.value: LabCollector was originally developed for the life sciences, but can be extensively and easily adapted to manage all laboratory activities in research and development.

AK.K04.value: Labii provides flexible data center options to accommodate various user needs. We offer shared data centers in the US, EU, and Hong Kong at no additional cost, allowing users to utilize these resources for free. Additionally, we provide the option to deploy dedicated data centers at a location of the user's choice or install the platform on their own server (locale data center) for an additional fee, offering enhanced customization and control.

AK.K20.value: Labii seamlessly integrates with other software packages through our API and predesigned widgets, making it easy to connect with your existing tools. Additionally, we offer custom integration options upon request, ensuring Labii can fit your unique workflow needs.

AK.K31.value: Labii offers flexible connectivity options, supporting both Serial Port and NFC (Near Field Communication) connections. Specifically, Labii is compatible with the RS-232 (Recommended Standard 232) communication protocol, a widely used standard for serial communication. This allows Labii to seamlessly communicate with devices connected via serial ports, enabling reliable data transfer and control. https://docs.labii.com/widgets/column-widgets/device

AK.K41.value: Labii offers customization at every tier of your account, starting from applications tailored for precise domain-specific data management, extending to tables crafted to handle and oversee distinct research data types, further down to table columns for structured data handling, and finally, to table sections managing unstructured data. https://www.labii.com/features/customization

AK.anbieter.sitz.value: Labii has datacenter in USA, Ireland, HongKong. https://www.labii.com/en/features/data-centers

AK.daten.eingabe.value: Labii develops hundreds of widgets, supporting numerous input methods, allowing users to select the one that best suits their needs and preferences. https://www.labii.com/features/widgets#Column

AK.daten.zugriff.value: Labii offers flexibility and convenience with both mobile apps for Android and iOS devices, as well as a responsive web design that adapts to various screen sizes and devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across platforms.

AK.fach.value: Labii's widgets provide a diverse range of functionalities aimed at meeting the unique requirements of researchers in different fields. These tools enable users to customize their data documentation process for every entry, guaranteeing effective and accurate research documentation. https://www.labii.com/en/features/widgets

AK.import.methode.value: Users have the option to input data using a QR/Barcode Scanner. Additionally, Labii can be connected directly to a device and receive input from a serial port. https://docs.labii.com/widgets/column-widgets/device

AK.kollaboration.value: Option to have live collaborations, mention to other Labii users.

AK.kontroll.vokabular.value: Labii utilizes ontologies and controlled vocabulary to ensure data consistency and accuracy, offering a dedicated ontology table for managing terms and their parent-child relationships. Users can create and manage their own terms, inserting them into the system as needed, and also import ontology terms from external systems, enabling seamless integration and standardization of terminology. By leveraging ontologies and controlled vocabulary, Labii enables users to maintain a consistent and organized semantic framework, enhancing data quality and facilitating effective search and analysis capabilities.

AK.labormanagement.funktionen.value: Labii revolutionizes lab digitalization with its groundbreaking full-stack platform, setting itself apart from traditional vendors by offering a no-code configuration system for applications and tables. Unlike others that rely on specific code blocks for individual products, Labii empowers users with unparalleled customization, enabling limitless configurations tailored precisely to your needs. This innovative approach means you can create an infinite array of products using Labii's singular platform, making it the sole solution of its kind in the market. https://www.labii.com/products

AK.lizenzmodell.value: The Professional Plan and Enterprise Plan are priced on a per-user-per-year basis.

AK.nutzungs.statistik.value: Labii offers hundreds of widgets that can be used in the dashboard to create a variety of usage statistics and customize your experience.

AK.preismodell.value: Labii offers a comprehensive pricing plan tailored to meet the diverse requirements of biotech organizations, catering from burgeoning start-up innovators to established industry giants. With a commitment to customization, Labii collaborates closely with your team to understand and address your specific business needs. Whether it's streamlined laboratory management, advanced data analysis tools, or integrated solutions for research workflows, Labii provides scalable and flexible pricing options that ensure accessibility and value for organizations of all sizes and stages of growth in the biotech sector. https://www.labii.com/en/pricing

AK.projektmanagement.tools.value: Labii has created a variety of tools to simplify project management, including task management for daily assignments, job management for outsourced projects, goal management to handle both short-term and long-term objectives, and password management to oversee shared login information for business purposes. https://www.labii.com/products/project-management

AK.sprachen.value: We can easily add support for other languages upon request.

AK.support.value: Labii offers a comprehensive range of support plans tailored to meet diverse needs. Whether it's the free support option, the dedicated support plan, or partnering with esteemed science service provider Zifo, Labii prioritizes delivering professional, swift, and amiable customer service. Labii ensures our customers receive top-tier assistance, guaranteeing that their queries are not just addressed but resolved accurately and efficiently. https://www.labii.com/features/support

AK.workflows.value: Labii Process Integration offers a state-of-the-art solution aimed at simplifying and enhancing intricate processes through an intuitive visual flowchart interface. Many business and scientific operations comprise numerous steps. Simply relying on single or multiple data documentation software doesn't assure users of following exact steps, leading to inefficiencies. To combat this, Labii has developed a process integration system that incorporates various internal and external software tools, fostering a unified environment for streamlined management. This groundbreaking platform enables organizations to seamlessly coordinate, oversee, and assess workflows, ultimately boosting productivity and collaboration. Moreover, it ensures data integrity and compliance throughout the entire process. https://www.labii.com/features/process-integration

AT.aktiv.info.value: 2024-06-09 Introducing Labii v10.0.0: A Revamped User Interface for Enhanced Research Experience. https://blogs.labii.com/news/2024-06-09-introducing-labii-v10.0.0-a-revamped-user-interface-for-enhanced-research-experience

AT.anbieter.sicherungsstrategie.value: Labii is dedicated to ensuring the safety of your data, prioritizing its confidentiality and integrity. All information produced within Labii adheres to regulatory standards like FDA 21 CFR Part 11. With various data center choices, Labii provides flexibility, enabling you to select your desired storage location. Our unwavering commitment to security protects your scientific endeavors, fostering a compliant and secure space for managing laboratories and collaborating on research. https://www.labii.com/en/features/security

AT.nutzer.value: Mass General Brigham from Harvard University (https://www.massgeneralbrigham.org/en)

AT.nutzer2.value: Mass General Brigham from Harvard University (https://www.massgeneralbrigham.org/en)

K.K04.03.value: Labii prioritizes data security and ensures an adequate level of protection for user data. Our service provider employs robust measures to safeguard data, including encryption, secure data centers, and access controls. Labii is compliant with industry-recognized standards and holds certifications such as ISO 27001 for information security management and GDPR for data privacy. Additionally, our infrastructure is regularly audited and penetration tested to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of user data. This commitment to data protection provides users with peace of mind, knowing their data is secure and handled in accordance with the highest industry standards.

K.K04.04.value: Yes, communication with the Labii cloud application is encrypted. We employ transport encryption protocols, such as TLS (Transport Layer Security) and HTTPS (Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure), to ensure that all data transmitted between the user's device and our cloud servers is securely encrypted. This guarantees that sensitive information remains confidential and protected from unauthorized access during transmission. Labii's transport encryption ensures a secure connection, providing an additional layer of protection for user data.

K.K04.05.value: Yes, Labii stores data in the cloud in an encrypted format. We utilize industry-standard encryption algorithms, such as AES (Advanced Encryption Standard), to ensure that all data at rest is securely encrypted. This means that sensitive information, including user data and files, is protected from unauthorized access and stored in a secure and encrypted environment. Labii's cloud storage encryption provides an additional layer of protection, ensuring that user data remains confidential and secure. Additionally, Labii's encryption keys are regularly rotated and managed securely to ensure the highest level of data protection.

K.K04.06.value: Labii implements robust access control measures to prevent unauthorized access to user data, including user authentication via secure login mechanisms and two-factor authentication, role-based access control, data encryption, and granular access permissions that control access to specific data and features. Additionally, all access and modifications to data are tracked and logged, allowing for monitoring and detection of potential security incidents. This multi-layered approach ensures that user data is protected from unauthorized access, and that each user only has access to the data and features they need to perform their tasks, providing a high level of security and control.

K.K04.07.value: Labii offers customizable Service Level Agreements (SLAs) to ensure our services meet the specific needs of our customers, guaranteeing 99.9% or higher uptime and availability, priority support with a maximum 2-hour response time for critical issues, regular backups and data redundancy for data protection, and optimal performance for seamless functionality and user experience. We work closely with our customers to understand their requirements and tailor our SLAs to meet their specific needs, ensuring our services align with their planned purpose and expectations, and demonstrating our commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable, and secure services that meet the evolving needs of our customers.

K.K04.08.value: Labii performs daily backups of user data, storing them for 30 days, and version backups are stored forever, providing a permanent record of all changes. These backups are securely stored in off-site locations, such as cloud storage services, and are protected with encryption and access controls to ensure their integrity and confidentiality. This comprehensive backup strategy ensures that user data is safe, secure, and can be easily recovered in case of any issues, providing peace of mind for our users.

K.K04.09.value: Labii provides a template for a Data Processing Agreement (DPA) that includes technical and organizational measures (TOMs) to ensure the security and privacy of user data, outlining responsibilities and obligations for data processing, including data collection and storage, access controls, encryption, backup and disaster recovery, incident response, and compliance with data protection regulations. This DPA template demonstrates Labii's commitment to transparency and accountability in data processing, helping customers meet their regulatory requirements and providing a clear understanding of Labii's data protection practices.

K.K33.value: SAFE-BioPharma Digital Identity and Signature Standard

dc.contributor.other.value: Labii is a dynamic team of passionate professionals dedicated to revolutionizing how laboratories operate. With a deep understanding of the challenges faced by researchers, we've developed a suite of integrated tools and platforms designed to simplify lab management, accelerate research processes, and foster a collaborative environment.

dc.description.abstract.value: Labii ELN (Electronic Laboratory Notebook) is a powerful digital platform that simplifies the documentation and management of experiments, enabling researchers to effortlessly capture detailed records of their procedures, observations, and results. By storing valuable research data in a single, organized repository, Labii ELN facilitates the generation of verifiable scientific discoveries and streamlines the research process. With its versatile applications in both production and R&D settings, Labii ELN offers various customization options to suit individual needs. Moreover, its seamless integration with other Labii modules enhances inventory management, further accelerating the pace of scientific innovation and discovery.

AK.K20.value: Microsoft Office Online; Extended MS Excel/MS Word interface

AK.K41.value: Parameterizable design of the user interface of modules such as masks and dashboards

AK.automatisierung.value: Parameterizing procedures (jobs) which should be executed automatically

AK.daten.eingabe.value: Interactive calendar view of resource per time unit

AK.daten.export.value: pdf, html, xhtml, database, csv/tsv, json, xml, barcodes, labels; parameterizable export of data from Limsophy into worksheets of MS Excel; publishing Limsophy data as Word report including data export/import MS Word, publishing Limsophy data coming from XHTML fields as a Word report (.docx)

AK.import.formate.value: Evernote, annotation of files/images, zip, json, xml, database

AK.labormanagement.funktionen.value: hierarchically structured object storage such as samples on micro arrays in refrigerators, rooms and buildings

AK.offline.function.value: Recording data offline with Limsophy on a mobile device. The data volume is reduced.

AK.projektmanagement.tools.value: Managing projects where subphases are displayed as Gantt charts; basic project management functions; Inspection module: Planning, documenting based on checklists, managing measures and deadlines, inspection reports and conclusions

AK.sprachen.value: Multilingual interface/add-on, multilingual with language change at runtime, Software and data can be translated into several languages

dc.description.abstract.value: Your work processes require storing unstructured research data. Your experiment reports are stored project- or study-related. Limsophy RIMS for research laboratories is best suited for you.

dc.description.abstract.value:
Mbook Chemistry is a web-based, cloud-hosted -an in-house option is also available- ELN solution. It is ideally suited for synthetic chemists with its reaction scheme and automatically generated & customizable stoichiometric table. Mbook is designed to accommodate users of distinct hierarchical profiles (from bench chemist to group manager) with associated permission (from read only to full project and team management). Mbook allows the creation of working teams and projects within which the level of access can be restricted. Mbook Chemistry also includes features such as supervisor-based experiment approval and experiment transfer and witnessing. 
Mbook Chemistry comes with Mbook Photo, a free App for tablets and mobile devices, making it easy for chemists to take snapshots in the lab and upload them effortlessly to their experiments.
In its Pro version, Mbook Chemistry also includes functionalities such as COSHH assessment forms, inventory and stockroom tools for a convenient live management of your reagents and tracking/reporting of special compounds (eg: CMR) usage.

AK.lizenzmodell.value: Annual license per user, including maintenance and support

AT.aktiv.info.value: Desktop version: regular customized releases / Web Application: in development, demo version available

dc.description.abstract.value:
Our electronic lab journal quattro/LJ is a powerful web-based laboratory notebook designed for a large variety of scientific disciplines within research and development. It can be easily combined with the compound management system quattro/CM and analysis extension quattro/BA.
Your experiments are documented and categorized digitally; audit trails and versions are tracked securely. quattro/LJ allows to work collaboratively on shared projects and experiments reducing redundancy and improving data integrity. Experiments can be electronically reviewed, signed and finalized. Experiments can be easily found as attachments can be searched and favourites can be defined.
Customization for individual requirements, data safety processes and integration to other systems, such as chemistry databases or compound management systems, is supported.

AK.K20.value: Instruments with RS232 output; Instruments with IP output; XML or other structured data file source

AK.fach.value: Originaly developed for the pharmaceutical industry; includes specialised application for development of inhaled products

AK.kollaboration.value: Messaging system, "sticky notes"; pre-defined roles: Customer, DataReviewer, Supervisor, QA, SampleManager, SampleCreator, Scientist, ReportDeveloper, TemplateDeveloper, Adminsitrator, Support

dc.contributor.other.value: SciCord improves laboratory efficiency and FDA compliance with a data management tool that empowers spreadsheets to enable information to be managed, controlled, structured, and shared.

dc.description.abstract.value: SciCords ELN/LIMS hybrid provides a set of preconfigured solutions to automate many laboratory functions. The solutions are plug-and-play modules, which are added to the Core SciCord solution. Solutions may also be configured to fit the specific needs of your organization. The solutions are compliance ready and include a full documentation package. Not only can SciCord provide ELN/LIMS services, but a major benefit of SciCord is the integration of other laboratory systems, such as instruments, document management, inventory, or reporting applications.
